channel.title: File type problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, ive dled RSMV and datmaker. Ive managed to get all of the models, but they have saved in Windows media player files , it says they are DAT files. But when I try to open them in dat maker, or meta , it just says invalid file type? Any ideas? Heres a pic of the problem.
[IMG]http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y129/Hoohs/problem.jpg[/img]
Cheers guys

item.title: File type problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Wow - very old version - look at my sig.

The invalid file format is because that version couldn’t handle the v2 file header.

Read full topic
